name: Irina
description: I am – this is a simple soul, which difficult live in alone in this big world.. I love silence.. I like meet a dawn and watch on stars. I adore invoke laughter and smiles of people close to me)). I love and want see my beloved man into eyes anytime and anywhere. I love sleep and wake up in the arms of my beloved man.. I love rain and sun:). In mornings, I like drink strong coffee;). Also I love music, summer, beach, happy people, a sense of euphoria. And most importantly, I love be loved))). We are all aware that woman has occurred out rib of man;). Not out of feet to be humiliated.. And not from his head to surpass him. But from side to be side by side with men be equal with him.. Out of under his arm to be protected… And from his side heart to be loved;). We must live in love with pleasure and with big interest:))) Please do not judge me harshly.. I am what I am I there is;)
